level.text: All complaints shall be filed with the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs (DCRA), Office of Compliance, Complaint Division. The complaint shall be in writing or reduced to writing by the Director.
The complaints filed with DCRA shall be reviewed by the Complaint Division as to jurisdiction, content, category, and for appropriate departmental or non-departmental referral.
The Complaint Division shall review all consumer complaints filed and within sixty (60) days shall notify all parties as to the allegations and as to any action by the Division.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is ยง4(10) of the D.C. Consumer Protection Procedures Act, D.C. Law 1-76, D.C. Code ยง28-3901 et seq. (1981).

level.heading: EDITOR’S NOTE
level.text: Section 812 of D.C. Law 11-52 amended the Automobile Consumer Protection Act of 1984 by suspending enforcement of this chapter by the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs until October 1, 1998 (D. C. Code ยง28-3902).
